I bought this for my partner so that she could download the NHS app ( not the NHS COVID-19 app ) for a vaccine passport. Her old phone didn't have a recent enough version of Android. 
This is a very good phone for the price but has one limitation, it is only 3G so doesn't go into the internet without wifi in many areas. It's still good for the Vaccination passport as long as you remember to print out a paper copy at home and not expect to bring it up on the phone at the airport, it probably wouldn't work without a wifi connection.
Otherwise a good phone for the price. Does most things, and easy to use.
